intro:
Open-source search engine based in Kaffiene.

* [Official site](http://127.0.0.1:43110/snifferdog.bit/)
* [Source-code](https://github.com/Plasmmer/Snifferdog)

post.body: Is easy to realise that its a dog in my profile photo?
Today's doodle: "41th anniversary of Apple Computer I".
Snifferdog is now the 5th most popular search engine in ZeroNet.

# DCRS - Web/HTML5 based computing

http://127.0.0.1:43110/dcrs.bit/ and http://127.0.0.1:43110/dcrs.bit/ui/

Please, contribute by seeding or with suggestions/pulls on GitHub.

comment.body: @Yinyue: 我在这里帮忙 有一个错误或您想要的网站没有索引？
@Yinyue: bit.no.com is closing in April 30. I'm already updated to support the new bit.surf.
@Yinyue: I'm currently with problems in scrapping urls, but I'll do it manually. Thanks for the 0cnguide link.
